name.ja: <ruby>Ｋ<rt>ケー</rt></ruby><ruby>９<rt>ナイン</rt></ruby>－ＥＸ<ruby>強制解除<rt>フォースリベレイション</rt></ruby>
name.ja_romaji: Kē Nain - Ī Ekkusu Fōsu Ribereishon

text.en: During the Main Phase: Target 1 "K9" Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "K9" Xyz Monster with a different name, by using that monster you control as material (this is treated as an Xyz Summon, transfer its materials to the Summoned monster), then you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls. At the end of the Battle Phase, if your "K9" monster battled this turn: You can Set this card from your GY. You can only use each effect of "K9 - EX Forced Liberation" once per turn.
text.zh-CN: 此卡名的①②效果1回合仅可各使用1次。①：在自己・对手的主要阶段，以自己场上的1只“K9”超量怪兽为对象可以发动。从额外牌组将卡名与该自己的怪兽不同的1只“K9”超量怪兽重叠在对象怪兽上面，视为超量召唤特殊召唤。然后，可将对手场上的1张卡破坏。②：自己的“K9”怪兽进行过战斗的回合的战斗阶段结束时可以发动。将墓地的此卡放置在自己场上。
